analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: Neutral momentum warrants tactical restraint. The GMS score of 51 signals a transitionary regime where expansionary impulses are neutralized by stagnant net liquidity and flat OGV vectors. While credit spread compression suggests systemic resilience, negative SPY momentum reveals underlying internal divergence. Real interest rates at 1.79% maintain a restrictive posture, necessitating a defensive alpha-seeking strategy until liquidity convexity returns to the fiscal-monetary nexus. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]

reports.EN: Neutral momentum warrants tactical restraint. The GMS score of 51 signals a transitionary regime where expansionary impulses are neutralized by stagnant net liquidity and flat OGV vectors. While credit spread compression suggests systemic resilience, negative SPY momentum reveals underlying internal divergence. Real interest rates at 1.79% maintain a restrictive posture, necessitating a defensive alpha-seeking strategy until liquidity convexity returns to the fiscal-monetary nexus. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]
reports.ES: El impulso neutral exige moderaciÃ³n tÃ¡ctica. El GMS de 51 seÃ±ala un rÃ©gimen de transiciÃ³n donde los impulsos expansivos son neutralizados por una liquidez neta estancada y vectores OGV planos. Aunque la compresiÃ³n de los diferenciales de crÃ©dito sugiere resiliencia sistÃ©mica, el impulso negativo del SPY revela una divergencia interna subyacente. Con tasas reales en 1.79%, se requiere una postura defensiva hasta que retorne la convexidad de la liquidez al nexo fiscal-monetario. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]

reports.ID: Momentum netral menuntut penahanan taktis. Skor GMS 51 menandakan rezim transisi di mana impuls ekspansif dinetralkan oleh likuiditas bersih yang stagnan dan vektor OGV yang datar. Meskipun kompresi spread kredit menunjukkan ketahanan sistemik, momentum negatif SPY mengungkapkan divergensi internal yang mendasari. Suku bunga riil 1,79% mempertahankan postur restriktif, memerlukan strategi defensif hingga konveksitas likuiditas kembali ke neksus fiskal-moneter. [MARKET STATUS: DEFENSIVE]
